body_text:
What happened to the last two Bastard!! OVAs? Bastard!! (1992) is a series of 8 OVAs, but only 6 were produced.
The manga currently has 27 Volumes and is one of Weekly Shōnen Jump's best-selling manga series selling more than 30 million copies.
Ref.
If the manga was so popular, how come the final two OVAs never got animated!?

Were there ever plans for a "Bastard!" TV series in Japan? Bastard! Is one of my favorite OVA series, and I've even read some of the manga. From what I can gather, an OVA series is either a precursor to or a result of a TV series of lower quality. Was there ever a plan to make such a series based on the manga?
